title: Yamaha VC5S Cello - 4/4 Size
description: The Yamaha VC5S Cello in 4/4 size offers a superb combination of craftsmanship and performance for intermediate and advanced players. Constructed from premium spruce and maple, this cello delivers a rich, warm sound with excellent resonance and sustain. The hand-carved body ensures superior sound quality, while the adjustable endpin and fine-tuner tailpiece provide optimal playability. The VC5S is equipped with high-quality strings that enhance the cello's natural tonal characteristics, making it a great choice for serious students and aspiring professionals alike. Experience the exceptional playability and rich tone of the VC5S cello.
meta_title: Yamaha VC5S Cello - 4/4 Size for Intermediate and Advanced Players
meta_description: Shop the Yamaha VC5S Cello in 4/4 size for intermediate and advanced players. Features premium spruce and maple construction with an adjustable endpin and fine-tuner tailpiece. Perfect for serious students and professionals. Buy now at a special price!

title: Yamaha VC5S Cello - 3/4 Size
description: The Yamaha VC5S Cello in 3/4 size is a top-quality instrument designed for intermediate players. Featuring a solid spruce top and maple back and sides, this cello offers a rich, resonant sound that is perfect for advancing musicians. The hand-carved body and fine craftsmanship ensure superior sound and playability. The cello comes with an adjustable endpin for comfort and a fine-tuner tailpiece for easy string adjustments. Ideal for students who are ready to step up from a beginner instrument, the VC5S provides a professional-grade playing experience with exceptional tonal qualities.
meta_title: Yamaha VC5S Cello - 3/4 Size for Advancing Students
meta_description: Buy the Yamaha VC5S Cello in 3/4 size for advancing students. Made with a solid spruce top and maple back for a rich, resonant tone. Features an adjustable endpin and fine-tuner tailpiece. Perfect for intermediate players. Get it now at a discounted price!
